name: Cognizant Protocol
description: Cognizant Protocol, a text based adventure game that brings player into the struggle of Aldis Farrell, an AI scientist who is unable to free himself from his emergency pod buried under crash landed space station.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: Intel Core I 3 or Equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
